{\n\t\tSystem.out.println(54 / 10);\n\t}\n}\n// => 5\n```\n\n```js\n// JavaScript\u3067\u6574\u6570\u306e\u5272\u308a\u7b97\nconsole.log(54 / 10);\n// => 5.4\n```\n\n\n### / 10));\n// =>
